working group.translation[0].definitions: a group that is formed to examine a particular situation or problem and suggest ways of dealing with it
The commission has set up a special working group to look at the problem.
set up/establish a working group (to do something)
a working group on constitutional reform
working group.translation[1].definitions: a committee that is formed to examine a particular situation or problem and suggest ways of dealing with it
A working group will evaluate costs and set deadlines.
